properties.NAME: A Painted House
properties.DESCRIPTION: 2003 film based on John Grisham's book that depict's John's childhood in northeast Arkansas.

properties.NAME: Mud
properties.DESCRIPTION: A 2013 film inspired by river tales of mark Twain and starred by Matthew McConaughey and Reese Witherspoon.

properties.NAME: Little Rock Central High: 50 Years Later
properties.DESCRIPTION: A 2007 documentary following the lives of present day students and focusing on the racial, social, and economic diversity in their lives.

properties.NAME: Shotgun Stories
properties.DESCRIPTION: 2007 film following a fued between two brothers after he death of their father.

properties.NAME: Daddy and Them
properties.DESCRIPTION: A 2001 film written, directed, and starred by Arkansas' own Billy Bob Thornton.

properties.NAME: Frank and Jesse
properties.DESCRIPTION: Starring Bill Paxton and Rob Lowe, this 1995 film follows the James and Younger brothers as they rob banks and trains at the end of the Civil War.

properties.NAME: Sling Blade - Garry's Burgers
properties.DESCRIPTION: Native Arkansan Billy Bob Thornton’s Academy Award winning film that depicts the life of a man who is released from a psychiatric hospital where he has been hospitalized since he was 12.

properties.DESCRIPTION: Native Arkansan Billy Bob Thornton’s Academy Award winning film that depicts the life of a man who is released from a psychiatric hospital where he has been hospitalized since he was 12.
